description: Projet de recherche à base communautaire avec comme objectif l’atteinte des 8 OMD dans Potou et 13 villages de la Communauté Rurale de Léona

subproject.description: The Millennium Village project is an integrated rural development project which will improve the lives of the people in the villages in the areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure. The project aims to attain the MDGs in 5 years with an additional investment of $50 per person per year. The coordination unit at HQ is to ensure swift implementation of the project trhough the country office, good relationship with the partners / donors and providing guidance and support for expansion (new MVs) and national MDG scale up programs.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: MV1 New York - RAF/05/023

subproject.description: The Millennium Village project is an integrated rural development project which will improve the lives of the people in the villages in the areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure. The project aims to attain the MDGs in 5 years with an additional investment of $50 per person per year. The coordination unit at HQ is to ensure swift implementation of the project trhough the country office, good relationship with the partners / donors and providing guidance and support for expansion (new MVs) and national MDG scale up programs.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: MV1 New York - RAF/05/023

subproject.description: The Millennium Villages aims to establish a rigorous proof of concept for implementing the practical interventions needed to achieve MDGs in Rural Africa over a five years time frame. Based on $50 per person per year the project aims at improving people’s lives with special emphasis to areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.Eliminate hunger and malnutrition,improved maternal health, increased assess to energy, digital gaps bridged in pursuit of the MDGs in selected villages.
subproject.title: MV1 Ghana - RAF/05/023
